content.detailedDescription: For the past 6 nights i have looked into the sky and seen these so called pulsating color changing stars and they have turned all sorts of crazy colors. so i got one of my friends with me and we walked around smoking our cigarrettes and out of nowhere the same object appered we stood there and watched this object for 20 mins untill it dissaperred. 4 nights before that i had been tracking the same ufo everynight for 4 nights.Then tonight happend not only one but about six of these pulsating light so colorfull i may add just about every color under the sun was pulsating out of these stars and they shot red beams and blue beams i or my friend were not scared of these but just very curious what were these and what were they doing in every direction you looked there was at least one of them and sooner or later we started watching other smaller blinkin lights besides the ball star like objects right next to them going so fast that these objects were zigzagin through the sky and if i may add there were about 2 of them over lake city ammunition plant. does anybody have a clue what these beautiful things are ive been trackin them like crazy and would love to know
content.summary: Multi colored pulsating lights high in the night sky

content.detailedDescription:
We were walking around smoking cigs at the time, when my friend pointed out the object. he said that he had seen it a few days before, and it was flashing unlike a normal star. i thought it was just a star, but then upon further inspection with our binoculars we saw that it was flashing every color of light imaginable, and it had three lights.

the object just sat there, hovering. we didn't know what to think about it. we weren't scared, just interested, then after watching it for 20 minutes, it vanished.
content.summary: Multiple bright, flashing, multicolored star-like object

content.detailedDescription: ~9:25pm while star gazing, a very dark object silently moved overhead, from east to west.  there were no lights, but maybe some faint reflections, because the front v shape of the object first caught my eye.  then by the view of stars disappearing above it i judged it was triangular, but possible saucer shaped.  at a steady moderate speed it passed directly overhead toward the mountains, in sight for about 15 seconds.  absolutely no sound.  no wind, planes or cars making any sounds at that moment.  the apparent size at the distance of my outstretched hand was between golfball and baseball size.
content.summary: Dark triangular craft passed overhead.  no lights, blocked out stars behind it.  completely silent.

content.detailedDescription: Me and a friend were driving down highway 70 east, westbound towards beaufort.  while driving i noticed two lights in the sky that were alternating in color from white to red with a pinkish aura.  at first i thought they were the beacons of a tower, so i asked my friend if there was a tower nearby.  he said, "no", and spotted them as well and pulled off the road to get a better look.  i had witnessed one of these lights before almost four nights ago, so i was surveying the sky while we drove.  like i mentioned before, i assumed there to be a tower where we observed the lights, but their peculiar lumination that informed me to their presence.  we thought they were airplane beacons that warned of a structure, then we assumed them to be high-altitude jets, but their lights were even brighter than the running lights for aircraft at night.  we could not tell if they had a body or were just made of light.  since we were traveling on a winding road, it was impossible to tell if they were moving or stationary.  the lights continued to change from white to red in no apparent order.  they did, however, appear to be in some sort of formation.  as we watched, i tried to ready my camera-phone, but my friend told me it was too dark to take a proper photograph.  i turned back up to look up just in time to see them leave.  the first light turned white and shot straight up.  the second left in the same manner a few moments after.  we were bewildered and tried to comprehend what we saw.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Witnessed two, pulsating, red to white objects that hovered for a time shot straight up into the atmosphere.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to smoke like i do every night and there was a pinkish orb in the distance;  i noticed it and kinda' paid attention, then as i looked up, it just disappeared slowly, then was back..Then did the same thing again.  this went on for about 10 min.  i watch the sky every night....This was something i've never seen before.
content.summary: I went outside to smoke like i do every night and there was a pinkish orb in the distance;  i noticed it and kinda' paid attention, then as i looked up, it just disappeared slowly, then was back..Then did the same thing again.

content.detailedDescription:
At approx 10:30 cst on may 5th, while filming the super moon and meteor shower, noticed 2 lights in flight traveling magnetic north.

first noticed objects from our location at approx a 65 degree angle to the south brightly light (from the supermoon illumination).  

as i grabbed camera from tripod to try and obtain a visual, the brightness of these 2 objects cut in half matching background brightness of stars.

they stayed at the same distance approx 1 degree to the side and one was an additional 1 degree south of the other.  same rate of speed, same distance entire time in sight.

as they progressed north, they kept diminishing in luminosity until we could no longer see them.  total time no longer than 3 mins,  probably closer to 2 mins.

i suspect military jets based on prior military experience working on jets. 

i am submitting to mufon, for verification that it was indeed military.  approx altitude i estimate to be 50 to 60,000 feet.  size of lights were same as typical stars on a clear evening.
content.summary: Odd lights in formation, illuminated by super moon disapating in brightness

content.detailedDescription:
At the given and indicated date and time, i noticed the objects appearing on the north western sky, traveling at a slower speed towards a south eastern
direction. at an angle of about 15 degrees to the east from my position, the individual lights diminished to the point of invisibility.
content.summary: Traveling at between 2-3000 feet altitude in almost straight line.

content.detailedDescription: Fiance and i were driving down a dirt road and noticed what looked like a large planet-sized light. it split into 3 separate lights; one headed right, one hovered in place, and another to the left. the left one separated for about 20 seconds then merged with the middle light, and the right light went in a straight line toward the trees. they vanished as if all lights simultaneously shut off at the same time.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Hovering lights over lake lure area.

content.detailedDescription: Looking out my window from my 7th story apartment, on the nite of 5/5/12  around 10pm after the rain and a little lighting and the conditions were cloudy, appeared out of know where this bright silver vertical shape object just sitting in the north sky. then it started to move very slow across the sky headed east with white lights going around it. i got my binoculars to get a up close view, but could not really focus in on it to well, it appeared to have windows with light shining thru and there was no sound at all. a few minutes later another one appeared in the same area, not moving at first and slowly it started to move southward towards me, i was feeling a little scared at this point. also i got this metallic taste in my mouth while this was happening. i watched the sky until about 12:30 am and did not see anymore strange sites in the sky. i would also like to mention earlier that day i seen a dark rod like cloud in the sky in the same area, very strange.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright silver object appeared from no where in the nite sky

content.detailedDescription: Looking out my window from my 7th story apartment, on the nite of 5/5/12  around 10pm after the rain and a little lighting and the conditions were cloudy, appeared out of know where this bright silver vertical shape object just sitting in the north sky. then it started to move very slow across the sky headed east with white lights going around it. i got my binoculars to get a up close view, but could not really focus in on it to well, it appeared to have windows with light shining thru and there was no sound at all. a few minutes later another one appeared in the same area, not moving at first and slowly it started to move southward towards me, i was feeling a little scared at this point. also i got this metallic taste in my mouth while this was happening. i watched the sky until about 12:30 am and did not see anymore strange sites in the sky. i would also like to mention earlier that day i seen a dark rod like cloud in the sky in the same area, very strange.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright silver object appeared from no where in the nite sky

content.detailedDescription: Around 8:45-9:00pm on saturday may 5, 2012 i was outside on my deck to let the dog out.  we had alot of cloud coverage that night but i still looked up to the sky to see if the moon was going to be visible. when i looked up i noticed at least 5 red orbs rising up into the sky from the south shore of long island.  the first orb was alittle ahead of the others. then there were a group of four which were closer together but seemed evenly spaced apart.  as i was watching them rise into the sky i thought i should go in the house and get my phone to take some pictures.  i grabbed my phone and turned it on and went back out onto the deck and continued to stare. when i looked at my phone to get the camera on i noticed that it had frozen so i started to shout to my neighbor who was just inside his house to come out and take a look.  he didn't hear me.  it was then that i noticed my other neighbors car coming home so i went through the house and out the front door to get them to look up at the sky. by this time the last of the orbs that i had seen had just started to head up to the clouds.  my  neighbors did see it and as i was telling them the direction that they had come from another one started to rise above the trees and follow the same path as the others. we all wondered what they could be?  thinking that maybe it was military or some type of fire work or flare, maybe even metiors.  there was no noise.  not until the last one disappeared above the clouds did we hear a plane.  they were mostly red orbs with what appeared to be orange or yellow on the right side. they rose up from the south and continue rising up through the clouds on a northern direction. i saw them for at least a few minutes.  they were moving at a steady pace with no sudden bursts of speed or change of direction.  what ever they were it was a pretty cool thing to see.
content.summary: Observed red orbs towards the south shore of long island new york

content.detailedDescription: Son noticed object about 30 degrees or so above the horizon while in car on the way to school at 7:50am.  he asked me if that was a star or an airplane.  i had to slump down a bit to see the object through my windshield, but saw it as well.  it appeared to be several miles off in the distance, perhaps 5 to 10 miles south of cheyenne from our perspective heading toward it.  it appeared to be round or perhaps slightly oval shaped, white and or reflective in the morning sun.  as we observed it for a minute or two it seemed to be moving away from us as it was getting slightly smaller, and appeared to be moving to the southeast.  after observing the object while still driving, i reached for my iphone which was in my pocket in order to film it.  as i looked down trying to turn on the camera, my son said "it's gone" which i observed as well when i looked up.  it definitely did not appear to be a plane or a helicopter as the shape appeared to clearly be round.  there is an air force base here in cheyenne so we are accustomed to seeing helicopters and planes.  it also did not appear to be a balloon as while driving 65 mph toward the object, it still appeared to be moving away slightly.  also, it did not appear to be rising like a balloon would on a very calm morning, which is unusual here.  it appeared to be a good distance to the south, but was either large enough to make out the round features of it, or perhaps it was closer than that and smaller.  hard to tell while driving.
content.summary: Reflective white round to oval shape object south of cheyenne. appeared to be moving south to southeast possibly at a fairly slow rate, then disappeared rather quickly.

content.detailedDescription: Just after 10:30 pm while driving my rv northeast on texas 97 between floresville and stockdale texas, witness orange round light out my left window in the direction of san antonio. i could not stop my vehicle on the road due to traffic but noticed the round light moving very slow at a height of 25 to 30 degrees off the ground and possibly in a north by northwest bound direction. as i approached the 87/97 intersection, the orange light seem to come to a stop north of 87. i estimate the light to be two to three miles from the intersection and southeast of the township of sutherland springs when i merged into 87-east bound; again, i could not stop due to the size of my rv. the orange light seems to be hovering between 400 to 500 feet agl and maybe 70 to 80 feet in diameter.
content.summary: Orange round light

content.detailedDescription:
On the road, my attention was drawn to what appeared to be a very long airplane flying low. venus was visible in the sky but i did not see other stars due to the light pollution. i stopped to observe a slowly randomly pulsating orange pinpoint light followed by a bright red regularly pulsating light. these two lights were separated by approximately 3 moon diameters, and the distance between the two was constant despite the fact that they were moving horizontally at a rate of around 90 degrees a minute. i could not see any other lights on either, or between (no evidence of aircraft position red or green lights on the small one, and no evidence of green light on the large red one).

my initial feeling was that of an incredibly long aircraft flying low or of an helicopter following a "light", but i could not figure what this "light" was. 

these two lights were travelling from west to east, about a mile away, at about 20-25 degrees elevation, and occasionnay passing between trees. i was observing from the north-east of the flightpath, so not in the best position to observe a green position light if there was any. 

observation lasted about a minute ad was terminated when the lights were blocked by trees. however i resumed driving west and about 90 seconds later saw a similar pulsating red light (cannot say if it was the same as the one previously seen) but this time the orange light preceding it was no longer observable. 

there is usually a lot of traffic around the airport nearby, but i was initially struck by:

either this was a fantastically long aircraft flying low or;
these were two aircrafts flying too close to each other, and without regulatory position lights.
content.summary: Two lights travelling close to each other but too large to be a single aircraft

content.detailedDescription: I was outside looking at airplanes. i was looking due west at an approaching airplane when i saw what looked like a red satellite. i have been researching satellites recently due to the fact that i have been seeing strange lights for the past 2 weeks so i know what satellites look like now. it was heading west for about 5 seconds. this part looked normal enough, but then, in a very graceful way it turned south and traveled across half sky in about 5 seconds! it was very dim and reddish. i know this was not a satellite because: 1. it turned abruptly. 2. it shot across half the sky in around 5 seconds. this makes the 3rd sighting for me in 2 weeks and 4 ufos total!
content.summary: Like a satellite but absolutely not a satellite!

content.detailedDescription:
My location is.
latitude = 33.3286, longitude = -111.8063
 
my wife, neighbor lady and i were sitting in the drive way watching the "super moon" starting at 8:20 pm local time when about 8:50 pm something made me look up and i noticed a dim fuzzy white cloud like object moving from the north to south. i told my wife and neighbor lady to look up and we all watched a cloud moving rather fast with no sound or blinking lights like a plane has.
 the object then started a turn to the east and passed in front of the moon and we could see it change to solid black triangle. as it went past the moon it returned to a dim fuzzy white cloud and faded out of sight as it continued traveling east.
content.summary: Fuzzy white cloud in black sky changed to black triangle as it crossed in front of moom then back to fuzzy white cloud. went from heading south to east.

content.detailedDescription: On the evening of 5/7/12 at 2106 local while walking my dog.I looked to the east toward the pierce county airport. i always look at the sky being an old pilot and aircraft mechanic. the righthand traffic pattern landing to the north goes directly over my home. i observed first one ogange/red object within 2-3 minutes i was looking at four objects. the color being emmitted from the objects were not red collision lights. in fact the only lights i observed were orange/red pulsating, no bright white strobes. the objects appeared in a more or less climbing straight line. living within 15 miles of joint ft. lewis and mccord ab my first thought was that i was watching four helicopters in trail returning to ft.Lewis. however after watching the objects for 2-3 minutes they didnot fly over my home on the way back to the fort. the first object continued to assend to my guess would be above 2500'-3000' at which time its light blinked out. within two minutes the second, third, and forth objects did exactly the same. while flying westbound and having all four objects in sight a light aircraft on final approach to pierce county airport passed under the objects by 500'-1000'
content.summary: While walking my dog, i looked to the east and observed 4 objects assending in a fairly straight line westbound. all 4 objects were orange/red in color. after observing all 4 objects for 2-3 min.All 4 objects blinked out in order.

content.detailedDescription: Was the height of a jetliner.  looked like a steady moving dull yellow ball, about the size of about 2-3 jupiters (the current one visable in the evening western sky.  no strobes, or any type running lights what-so-ever.  smooth, and steady speed.  no residue, ie: a meteor burning.  stayed horizontal in reference to the ground.  i didn't see it fade in the distance, because when i went to get field glasses, it was gone when i returned.  thanks
content.summary: Looked out my picture window viewing west, saw dull dark yellow ball with steady jet type speed move smoothly.  no lights what-so-ever  .  possibly the height of a jetliner.

content.detailedDescription: I was taking a picture of the super moon on may 6, 2012 and this bright green object was flying around above the trees, hovered then took off. it changed colors from green to yellow. it moved very quickly. it was very odd and i have the photo of it by the supermoon. if you brighten the picture you can see my tree line on the back hill.
content.summary: Bright green blink to yellow flying and hovering then took off upwards

content.detailedDescription:
Driving eastward on rt 111 in derby vt, approx 9:10 pm on may 06, 2012 my friend dave and myself noticed (2) sets of white triangle shaped lights with red lights in the center.  the center red lights were pulsating.  they appeared to be hovering.  no noise was heard.  as we continued to observe the objects they began to move simultaneously with the exact same movement/pattern.  we decided to speed up to see if we could get closer to the objects for a better look.  we were now traveling at approx 80mph.  we could not keep up with these objects.  then the objects reached the wooded area and disappeared.  we got back home, and went for binoculars and cameras to if we could relocate the objects.  nothing, continued to check throughout the rest of the evening but they did not reappear.  

this was observed as the second evening of the super moon, as it was just rising over the tree line.  very bright.  

please note:  there are no military bases in the area, or airports in close proximity to where these lights were observed.  

will say that it was a very eery feeling, seemed time passed very slowly.
once objects started moving, everything seemed to happened very quickly.

if anyone else observed these lights, would appreciate it if you would let us know.
content.summary: Morgan vt (2) 3 white lights in triangle shape with a red light in middle

content.detailedDescription:
I would be pleased to have someone call/email me to review the following.

we have recently returned from dinner (10.30 pm) at the jamaica inn. the night is clear. i had one-half glass of beer at dinner; my friend had one glass of wine.She (retired travel agent)called me (retired psychologist) to the second floor porch where she was standing, looking in a west-southwest direction.

she said "look!" i saw a regular (in pairs)formation of 24-30 ufos, moving along two parallel paths in the arc of sky visible to us. it was impossible to guess size, speeed or altitude. 

this initial formation was followed by one pair of delta-shaped ufos, in effect, like a rear guard position. the latter two moved in the opposite direction of an imagined arrowhead. 

we were so surprised, in awe, that neither of us thought to get a camera. our second-floor porch (room 32 - the cowdray suite) was above tree top level. the ufos disappeared from our view due to the configuration of the inn's architecture.

1. we had been packing to return home after our holiday. i have no idea what caused her to look up.

2. she pointed, and said "look!" in a tone of voice that said "drop whatever you are doing, come here and look!"

3. although in no way a ufo "buff," my immediate thought was ufos, i.E., the only possible explanation. my academic training is physics/mathematics (undergraduate), money management (mba) and psychology (ph.D.)

4. i have done so.

5. my feeling was of imediate belief in what my senses were showing me, although had there not been a witness standing next to me, i might have begun to doubt what i saw after 1-2 weeks.
content.summary: 25-30 very bright ufos moving along 2 parallel paths at consistent speed and altitude, of irregular polygon shape followed by a final pairof delta-shaped ufos moving opposite to the direction of the imagined arrowhead

content.detailedDescription:
I would be pleased to have someone call/email me to review the following.

we have recently returned from dinner (10.30 pm) at the jamaica inn. the night is clear. i had one-half glass of beer at dinner; my friend had one glass of wine.She (retired travel agent)called me (retired psychologist) to the second floor porch where she was standing, looking in a west-southwest direction.

she said "look!" i saw a regular (in pairs)formation of 24-30 ufos, moving along two parallel paths in the arc of sky visible to us. it was impossible to guess size, speeed or altitude. 

this initial formation was followed by one pair of delta-shaped ufos, in effect, like a rear guard position. the latter two moved in the opposite direction of an imagined arrowhead.

1. we had been packing to return home after our holiday. i have no idea what caused her to look up.

content.detailedDescription: Sat may 5, 2012 around 2:30ish going n on toll rd 73 towards newport bch i'm on mountain top area of 73 & look off 2 right towards irvine spectrum/fields, still s of orange balloon in park & hovering above but not far above ground b-c on mtn top it was almost across fr me is a giant (football field plus...) long, thin, dk gray ??? hovering there. i almost drove off road. i know what it was not but i don't know what it was. not a cloud, not an airplane, not a helicopter...Truly nothing i can say i know of unless military is doing something secret @ old el toro air field (this was a bit south near spectrum) or ??? i assumed it would be all over news. nothing?! i assumed 1,000's of people saw this from ground. i assume u'll be bombarded by reports. i called my friend coming south on 5 but she didn't c it? it was something! if i wasn't driving & late 4 appt, i would've tried 2 film it but couldn't crash car.If it is secret military 4 national security i don't want 2 talk abt it but what is it? does anyone know?
content.summary: I was on the toll road up in mountains heading 2 newport & looked off 2 my right & almtt drove off rd b-c i could not believe what i saw hovering above irvine near spectrum, fields the size of at lst a football field & looked dk gray & long & thin

content.detailedDescription: My dad and i had been staying the weekend with my aunt and uncle in paris, ky. that evening we decided to order us a pizza for supper and decided that we would go and pick it up instead of having them deliver it. my aunt lived in a suburb, we were leaving the suburb to get the pizza when we noticed something very low in the sky above us, hovering over the center of the road. we stopped at one of the stop signs and rolled down the windows to get a better look at it. above us was a dark (black-ish, near the color of the night sky) object, triangular in shape as far as we could tell. three lights went along the bottom of it, one in the front and two in the back. there was no sound, just the lights and faint outline of the craft. it was low...Really low...Probably just a few feet above the houses on either side of the street. it simply sat there. a few minutes after we had been stopped to look at it, another car pulled up beside us. it was crammed full of people - most looking around their mid-twenties to mid-thirties. they stopped and rolled their windows down as well to talk to us. they asked us if we knew what it was, we answered that we didn't. and a short conversation between my aunt and a couple of guys in the car went on about it for a bit. at one point a couple of the people in their car got out to look at it. eventually we noticed the time and that the pizza place would be closing soon. so we left and hoped that the craft would still be there when we got back. it took us about 15 minutes or so to go get the pizza. and when we turned into the suburb we kept looking in the sky, but the craft was gone and the other car full of people had left as well. we then headed back to my aunt's house and told my dad and uncle, who, of course, thought we were joking and had made it up. my aunt was never someone who believed in the paranormal, and this was the only time i got to talk to her about such things without her laughing. in fact, not once during the whole encounter did she make any jokes or chuckle.
content.summary: Hovering triangle over suburb

content.detailedDescription: Flying westbound at 3000 feet south of phoenix, took forward picture out of the cockpit, at approx 45 degrees up noticed 3 objects north bound. took another picture out the copilot side windsheild and zooming could see 5-6 objects considerable higher headed toward phoenix in different formation than earlier picture.  on closer examination noticed the objects were brillant silver metalic looking reflecting sunlight in the second picture zoomed they were just bright white no reflection as they gained altitude and changed formation.  this took place at 10:03 am saturday may 5th 2012 altitude is msl
content.summary: Flying my airplane at 3000 ft west bound, took two pictures could see 5-6 objects

content.detailedDescription: Flying westbound at 3000 feet south of phoenix, took forward picture out of the cockpit, at approx 45 degrees up noticed 3 objects north bound. took another picture out the copilot side windsheild and zooming could see 5-6 objects considerable higher headed toward phoenix in different formation than earlier picture.  on closer examination noticed the objects were brillant silver metalic looking reflecting sunlight in the second picture zoomed they were just bright white no reflection as they gained altitude and changed formation.  this took place at 10:03 am saturday may 5th 2012 altitude is msl

content.summary: Flying my airplane at 3000 ft west bound, took two pictures could see 5-6 objects

content.detailedDescription: This happened when i was around 7 years old. i was up in my uncle's yard trying to draw the night sky with my crayons in a butterfly-shaped notepad. the only light was a dim street light that was a few yards behind me and slightly to my left. i could just barely see to draw and was mostly just trying to get constellations in the right place in my drawing. as i was looking at the sky, i saw what i thought was a star. but it was moving across the sky. so, having seen plenty of helicopters and planes in the night sky before, i assumed that's what it was. it was just about as big and bright (and even looked about as far away) as the stars around it. there were no other lights like most planes have, it was just the single white light moving across the sky at a steady pace. it had almost crossed the entire sky, when it got near the treeline...And then shot rapidly across the sky! it was as fast as a shooting star, but i had never saw a shooting star move so slowly across half the sky and then shoot like that. i thought it was strange, but continued my drawing. then, a few minutes later, i saw it (or a different one) come back over the treeline. it went slowly across the sky until it got right over head, then it shot across the rest of the sky as fast as the first one/first time. i then got scared, grabbed my notebook and crayons, and ran back home. i kept the drawing in that notepad that i drew for several years after that.
content.summary: Shooting star ufo

content.detailedDescription: I was around 5 years old and was looking out the back window of my house while my mom was in the bathroom washing my sister's hair. from that window you can see an upward hill, my uncle's house, some trees; very little sky from that window is visible. as i was gazing out the window, i noticed that i could no longer see the ground, in fact, all i saw was the night sky. in the center of the sky was a large 4-pointed star. i remember at the time thinking that it was the star of bethlehem, as it looked exactly like the drawing on the back of a cross my mamaw had given me. i made a wish on it for a barbie doll that had just came out for my birthday that year, which was a month or two away. i do not remember what happened after that, it was as if i was no longer in my house during the episode. even the window panes were no longer visible as i was looking at this star-like object. i do remember thinking however, that this is home. i didn't really think about it much after that until a month or so later when i realized that through that window (or any window in my house really) i cannot see that much sky. and there are not stars that normally look that big. i can, however, remember the event vividly even today.
content.summary: Witnessed star-like ufo

content.detailedDescription: My house. began to shake and it sounded like a rocket flying through the air my pit bull got very very scared and ran into the bathroom i went out on to my deck and started looking for what was going on  i couldn't see anything at first but new there was something very close as the cups on the table were shaking then i seen what looked to be a smudge in the sky about 50 feet in front of me and about 80 feet in the air it looked very camaflouged and it flew slowly right above my house as it passed over i ran through the house and out the front door and observed it  for about another 100 feet the. it just went silent and disappeared completely it was fully trippy and dispite my excitement it weirded me out on how bad it scared my pitbull and cat!
content.summary: It was very large and very noisy it sounded like there was something wrong and it looked like a smudge in the sky
